name: Forms on the Fly
tag_list: quiz, form-builder, application, blog, questionnaire, feedback, diagnostic, start-up-business, small-business
overview:
Just launched, Forms on the Fly allows anyone to build and publish intelligent, interactive forms.

With no programming required, anyone can use Forms on the Fly to create quizzes, questionnaires and diagnostics that entertain, inform or deliver support and training as well as generating leads.

Crucially, itâ€™s not a survey tool. Quizzes and questionnaires built with Forms on the Fly donâ€™t only collect information, they can easily be configured to deliver it too. So, users can find out more about who is visiting their site, while their site visitors receive automated yet personalised feedback reports.

For only Â£5 per month, bloggers can create an unlimited number of business diagnostics, womenâ€™s magazine style quizzes, e-learning tools, quizzes, games, personality tests and more, all branded with their own logo and name, and easily embedded in their blogs with the HTML code provided.
